document_data.name: Jonstyl's Banner
document_data.mainbody: '''Jonstyl's Banner''' was a rooming house in [[Tilverton]] in [[1367 DR]] run by the [[Adventurer|ex-adventurer]] [[Jonstyl]].
document_data.Location: The Banner was located in the [[Old Town (Tilverton)|Old Town]] of Tilverton on [[Gateguard Road]], just down from [[Filani]]'s [[Tower of Wits and Work]] and the [[Temple of Gond Wondermaker]]. It was formerly the [[Windlord's Rest]] inn until [[Thungor Triblane]] moved to larger premises nearby.
document_data.Activities: Jonstyl catered specially for adventurers. She offered discrete lodgings and ''[[Potion of healing|potions of healing]]'' to those that needed it, and provided mounts, disguises, and meals at a moment's notice at any hour.
document_data.Inhabitants: Along with the regular guests, the former proprietor Thungor paid for two shy [[gnome]]s to live at the Banner. Their job was to meet guests who arrived at the Banner, expecting to find the Windlord's Rest, and guide them to the Windlord's new location a few streets over.
